txt.en:
'Thank you for your efforts in assisting Harwick, [placeholder]. I am in your debt.

'If you wish to continue your efforts, you should head to the outpost Twickenburg, south of here on the way to Floodwend.

'I have not heard from the men there in many days, and I worry that things go badly for them.'

'I am glad you arrived when you did! I have only enough warriors to keep this post secure, and scout the road area to report back to Captain Agelmund, but we lack the ability to keep the road safe.\n\n'You look hardier than most warriors I see these days. Perhaps you can help keep the road safe by tackling the source of the problems, eh? We have trouble brewing just north of here.'
Sergeant Tidlac is stationed at Twickenburg, an outpost on main road running through the Wold. The watch-tower of Twickenburg has a good vantage point of the Wold cross-roads.
The fort of Twickenburg is north of Floodwend along the main road between Harwick and Floodwend.\n\nYou should seek the sergeant in charge of Twickenburg to see how they fare.
